name: Zork
description: Choose your own adventure adaptation of Zork.

pages.text:
West of House

This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door. There is a small mailbox here. A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies by the door.

West of House

You open the mailbox, revealing a small leaflet that reads 'WELCOME TO ZORK'.

Forest

You are in a forest. There is a large tree here.

Up a Tree

You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. You find a bird's nest with a large egg encrusted with precious jewels. You take the egg.

Clearing

You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on the west and south. There is a pile of leaves on the ground covering a grate, which is locked.

Canyon View

You are at the top of the Great Canyon on its south wall. From here there is a marvelous view of the Canyon and parts of the Frigid River upstream. Across the canyon, the walls of the White Cliffs still appear to loom far above.

Canyon Bottom

You are beneath the walls of the river canyon which may be climbable here. There is a small stream here, which is the lesser part of the runoff of Aragain Falls. To the north is a narrow path.

End of Rainbox

You are on a small, rocky beach on the continuation of the Frigid River past the Falls. The beach is narrow due to the presence of the White Cliffs. You dig up a coffin, wave the sceptre you find inside and receive a pot of gold!

North of House

You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Behind House

You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar. You can open the window far enough to allow entry.

South of House

You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Kitchen

You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. On the table are a sack smelling of peppers, and a bottle of water. You gather everything up.

Living Room

You are in the living room. There is a door to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room hiding a trap-door. There is a trophy case here containing a lantern. On hooks above the mantelpiece hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity. You immediately grab the lantern and the sword.

Cellar

You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading east, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable. The trap door crashes shut, and you hear someone barring it. Your sword is glowing with a faint blue glow.

West of Chasm

You are on the west edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. The east side is sheer rock, providing no exits. A narrow passage goes west, and the path you are on continues to the north and south. Your sword is no longer glowing.

Gallery

This is an art gallery. Most of the paintings which were here have been stolen by vandals with exceptional taste. The vandals left through either the north, south, or west exits. Fortunately, there is still one chance for you to be a vandal, for on the far wall is a work of unparalleled beauty which you take.

North-South Crawlway

This is a north-south crawlway; a passage goes to the east also. There is a hole above, but it provides no opportunities for climbing. Your sword is glowing with a faint blue glow.
